hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #the Mirror Shield# and #a Piece of Heart#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say all toasters toast toast.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that Sheik dispelled the barrier around #Ganon's Tower#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Bottom of the Well Small Key#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the path to #Bongo Bongo#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #the Prelude of Light#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that ##Lake Hylia## has #2# major items.

GC (Medigoron).text: Did you know that Barinade is allergic to bananas?

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #Dead Hand in the well# guards...^ #Deku Nuts (10 pieces)# and #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Lens of Truth Chest
Bottom of the Well Invisible Chest

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: ZR Near Open Grotto Freestanding PoH

HC (Malon).text: They say that between the #crawl spaces in the Spirit Temple# chests contain...^ #a Compass# and #a Ganon's Castle Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Child Early Torches Chest

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Spirit Temple Small Key#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #a Spirit Temple Small Key# can be found in #Hyrule Field#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Goron Mask#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# is on the way of the hero.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Boomerang#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Red Rupee#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #the Graveyard# is on the path to #Evil's Bane#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# hoards #a Deku Stick#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern End of Bridge Chest

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that a #village well# leads to #Dodongo's Cavern#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# hoards #the Fire Arrows#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key# and #a Red Rupee#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that a single #scrub in the crater# sells #the Biggoron Sword#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Red Rupee#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Epona's Song#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Bottom of the Well Small Key#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Epona's Song#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #Pierre atop the Fire Temple# hides #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Boomerang#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that a #tent in the valley# covers the #House of Twins#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo's Fortress# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Right).text: They say that shooting a #target in the woods# grants #a Goron Tunic#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that ##Zora's Fountain## has #1# major item.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Spirit Temple Small Key#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #the Requiem of Spirit# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #a Bottom of the Well Small Key#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the way of the hero.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Goron Mask#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #storm within Gerudo's Fortress# reveals #2 Deku Scrubs# including an Upgrade one.
